question:
You are going for a one-week vacation and your friend agreed to stay at your place while you are away. Write a letter to him/her.


In your letter, you should:
thank her/him and tell the dates of your holiday
explain how he/she enters the house
describe what you expect him/her to do.
text: I’m just writing to let you know that I’m on my vacation for one week by next month and really thankful for your esteem to come and stay at home while being away. I’ll start my journey on 22nd June 2022 from Trivandrum to Switzerland on an Air India flight a tour conducted by the company as a thankful for my work commitment.

I had kept my keys for the front grill door on the car porch beside the overhanging slab to enter inside. After,that you will find a fish tank on your left side where you’ll find the keys for my main door by which you can enter the home. However, the door keys for inside rooms are kept in a prayer room which you’ll spot on your straight-ahead corridor after entering through the main area.

I would like you to help me in doing two things while am leaving on my travel period. Firstly, please feed up the fish on daily basis every evening for them to stay alive. Secondly, you’ll find a plethora of plants kept outside beside the car parking which need to be watered every morning. I’d be really grateful if you could do the above mentioned on time till we meet after my vacation.
All the best, keep in touch.
